details.arabic_diacless: ربنا عليك توكلنا واليك انـبنا واليك المصير‏
details.arabic: رَبَّنَا عَلَيۡكَ تَوَكَّلۡنَا وَاِلَيۡكَ اَنَـبۡنَا وَاِلَيۡكَ الۡمَصِيۡرُ‏
details.transliteration: rabbanaAAalayka tawakkalna wa-ilayka anabna wa-ilayka almaseer
details.translations: Our Lord, upon You we have relied, and to You we have returned, and to You is the destination.
